com.dantann.recylerviewtemplate.framework

Class BindableAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • com.dantann.recylerviewtemplate.framework.BindableAdapter<T>

  • public abstract class BindableAdapter<T>
extends BaseAdapter
    An implementation of BaseAdapter which uses the new/bind pattern for its views.
    See Also:
    BaseAdapter
